SOURCE CODE 

0001 function graph = filloutrelgraph(graph)
0002 
0003 % make graph transitive
0004 
0005 switch graph.type
0006   case{'connected', 'connectednoself'}
0007     graph.adjcluster = graph.adjcluster | graph.adjcluster';
0008   otherwise % make graph transitive
0009     nclass = size(graph.adjcluster, 1);
0010     descendants = find_descendants(graph.adjcluster);
0011     for i=1:nclass
0012       graph.adjcluster(i,descendants{i}) = 1;
0013     end
0014 end
